turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'm looking to order Starbucks drink, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering a grande mocha latte with 2% milk and no whipped cream, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, and I'm going to pick that up at 57 Main Street.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i'll send your order to the location on 57 main street.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be texted to you and your order will be ready in 8 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's it. Thank you very much.
